square

Class Surprise

  • java.lang.Object
    • square.Square
      • square.Surprise
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AttackTool, DefenseTool

    public abstract class Surprise
extends Square
    Class representing surprise of the game board

    An surprise is defined by those informations :

    • name :

    A surprise can have actions such as :

    • interaction
    • display square informations
    • get equipped with defense tool
    • get equipped with attack tool
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Marl√®ne

      • getEquippedWithDefenseTool

        public void getEquippedWithDefenseTool(DefenseTool defenseTool,
                                       Perso perso)
        The perso get equipped with a defense tool.

        The perso get equipped with a defense tool and get the life level of it .

        Parameters:
        defenseTool - The defense tool to be equipped with
        perso - The perso who will be equipped
        See Also:
        DefenseTool.getBonusLifeLevel(), Perso.setDefenseTool(DefenseTool), Perso.getLifeLevel(), Perso.setLifeLevel(int)

      • getEquippedWithAttackTool

        public void getEquippedWithAttackTool(AttackTool attackTool,
                                      Perso perso)
        The perso get equipped with an attack tool.

        If the attack tool matches the perso attack tool kind, the perso get equipped with it and get the attack strength bonus of it. If not, the perso doesn't equipped with it.

        Parameters:
        attackTool - The attack tool to be equipped with
        perso - The perso who will be equipped
        See Also:
        AttackTool.getBonusAttackStrength(), Perso.setAttackTool(AttackTool), Perso.getAttackStrength(), Perso.setAttackStrength(int)
